documents.document: loved the hotel and friendly staf the hotel has for the price we payed a verry good service ,staf at the reception is good and also in the restaurant are good in cleaning the table,s givving ansewers for youre questions, the rooms are clean and more then enough space for 2 people,the only min.point the swimmingpool and the bar and cafe where closed in the time we spend here but you can order youre drinks in the restaurant in the evening great hotel, we stayed herre infrom 13th 01 08 till 16th 01 08
